game_description: Speeding Sheeps! Reject Humanity, Become SHEEP. Run, Jump, Speed ike a SHEEP! Put on some fancy cosmetics as you play minigames with your friends! This is a unique locomotion so expect a few bugs.
review_1: Troy it is icy I think it is a good game but I want you to add that you can pick what hand the horrible go on I do haft to restart my game a lot because of bugs in the game
review_2: so once I hopped on speeding sheeps I saw no one in the server and when I was looking at the maps I saw still no one and I was alone
review_3: I love the game it’s like gorilla tag but with a twist love this game forever ♾
review_5: just ate sheep ice cream 10/10 Edit: it was tasty :D
